member.name: PBRANGE
member.summary: Contains information about the high and low limits of a progress bar control. This structure is used with the PBM_GETRANGE message.

member.name: PBRANGE.iLow
member.summary: Low limit for the progress bar control. This is a signed integer.

member.name: PBRANGE.iHigh
member.summary: High limit for the progress bar control. This is a signed integer.
